addCert(bytes,bytes).details: Add a X.509 certificate to an existing tree/chain

params.parentPubKey: The parent certificate's DER-encoded public key

proveOwnership(bytes,bytes,uint256,bytes.details: An account calls this method to prove ownership of a certificate.     If successful, certs[certId].owner will be set to caller's address.

params.blockNumber: The value of signThis()[1] (must be > block.number - 256)
params.sigAlg: The OID of the algorithm used to sign `signature`
params.signature: signThis()[0] signed with certificate's private key

signThis().details: The return values of this function are used to proveOwnership() of a     certificate that exists in the certs mapping.
signThis().return: Some unique bytes to be signedThe block number used to create the first return value
